channel.title: Client help for rscd v25 -.- please
channel.description:
well i fixed it but whats the client code in the run_client (for rscd v25) because everytime i try to load it it does this
'ant' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

item.description:

I cant find the Java Paths In MY Server!!! Lol !!@ )

item.title: Client help for rscd v25 -.- please
item.dc:creator: @krth krth
item.description:
@krth wrote:

run_client.bat

@echo off C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\ant runclient pause

run_server.bat

@echo off C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\ant runserver pause

run_lserver.bat

@echo off C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\ant runls pause

I knew you were gonna ask.

^ That configuration works for me, if you want you can fix the java paths, just go to C:\Program Files\Java, and fix the versions if you have different ones. the _06 _07 -s.

Common sense training is not bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help for rscd v25 -.- please
item.dc:creator: @krth krth
item.description:
@krth wrote:

i am posting, so you can’t say that i haven’t posted…

get apache, details in rscd setup guide, then extract it to your C:\ drive like that C:\apache-ant-1.7.0
make sure that the directory is C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\ not C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\apache-ant-1.7.0\apache-ant-1.7.0\
or something like that…

then open the batch files, and add

C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\

in front of ant

C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin\ant

in all the batch, that contain “ant” files if you’re going to use them…

Read full topic
